name: 新星辰变
description:
This game is a text-based placement game that focuses on cultivating and upgrading immortals. It integrates 64 cultivation systems such as Realm, Root Bones, Divine Beasts, Immortals, Treasures, Strange Fire, and Heavenly Sword, as well as 24 dungeons, with diverse gameplay. There are both simple single player placement games and interactive systems such as guilds, sects, teams, brothels, weddings, and mentorship.

The battle mode of the game is entirely in textual form, giving players enough imagination space. At the same time, the theme of cultivating immortals allows players to experience various realms such as the mortal realm, immortal realm, divine realm, spiritual realm, underworld, and spiritual realm, constantly crossing tribulations and ascending, undergoing rebirth, forging and refining souls, and embarking on the true path of cultivating immortals.

There are multiple combat modes set in the game, including single player idle, double team formation, multiplayer dungeons, one click combat, and more.
